newProducts.title: LightRAG
newProducts.description: Simple and Fast Retrieval-Augmented Generation framework for building AI applications with enhanced context retrieval and generation capabilities.

newProducts.title: Google ADK-Go
newProducts.description: Google's Go toolkit for building AI agents with flexibility and control, providing developers with tools to create autonomous coding agents in Go.

newProducts.title: Memori
newProducts.description: Open-Source Memory Engine for LLMs & Multi-Agent Systems, enabling persistent memory and context management for AI coding assistants.

newProducts.title: Microsoft Call Center AI
newProducts.description: AI agent for handling phone calls via API, demonstrating Microsoft's expansion into voice-based AI agents for developer integration.

newProducts.title: JOPA Java Compiler
newProducts.description: Java compiler in C++, modernizing Jikes to Java 6 with Claude assistance, showcasing AI-assisted development of traditional developer tools.

whitelistUpdates.title: Claude Opus 4.1 Available for Enterprise
whitelistUpdates.description: GitHub Copilot Enterprise now includes access to all models, including Claude Opus 4.1 and more, with new pricing at $39/user/month

whitelistUpdates.title: Copilot Sessions on Android & Post-Quantum SSH Security
whitelistUpdates.description: GitHub Copilot sessions now available on Android devices and post-quantum security for SSH has been introduced. Latest updates include AI-powered agents and TypeScript becoming the #1 language.

whitelistUpdates.title: Series D Funding and Version 2.1 Release
whitelistUpdates.description: Raised $2.3B in Series D funding, passed $1B revenue in November 2025. Released version 2.1 with improved Plan Mode and AI Code Review features.

insights.title: Agent Design is Still Hard
insights.description: Notes that 'abstractions are not worth adopting yet' for AI agents, indicating that current agentic AI systems lack mature design patterns and architectural principles.
insights.author: Simon Willison

insights.title: The Learning Loop and LLMs
insights.description: Explores how LLMs become 'illusory' if they shortcut essential learning in professional practice, raising concerns about AI tools potentially hindering developer skill development.
insights.author: Unmesh Joshi

insights.title: Agentic AI and Security
insights.description: Examines security risks in agentic AI systems through what Simon Willison named the 'Lethal Trifecta', highlighting critical security concerns in autonomous AI systems.
insights.author: Korny Sietsma

insights.title: Google Antigravity Exfiltrates Data
insights.description: Discusses security vulnerabilities discovered in Google's new IDE, raising concerns about data privacy in AI-powered development environments.
insights.author: Simon Willison

insights.title: Can Vibe Coding Beat Graduate CS Students? An LLM vs. Human Coding Tournament
insights.description: Presents research comparing LLM coding capabilities with human students on market-driven strategic planning tasks, providing empirical insights into AI vs human coding performance.
insights.author: Research Paper

insights.title: RPM-MCTS: Knowledge-Retrieval as Process Reward Model with Monte Carlo Tree Search for Code Generation
insights.description: Introduces advanced techniques for code generation using knowledge retrieval and process reward models with Monte Carlo Tree Search, pushing boundaries in AI-assisted coding.
insights.author: Research Paper

insights.title: Fara-7B: An Efficient Agentic Model for Computer Use
insights.description: Presents an efficient agentic AI model specifically designed for computer-based tasks, representing advances in practical AI agent deployment.
insights.author: Research Paper

insights.title: NNGPT: Rethinking AutoML with Large Language Models
insights.description: Explores novel approaches to using LLMs for Automated Machine Learning, potentially impacting how AI systems are built and deployed.
insights.author: Research Paper

insights.title: OpenAI needs to raise at least $207B by 2030
insights.description: Discusses the massive capital requirements for AI development, with significant community engagement on Hacker News, indicating the scale of AI infrastructure investment needed.
insights.author: Hacker News Community

insights.title: Launch HN: Onyx (YC W24) â€“ Open-source chat UI
insights.description: Features a new open-source chat interface, showing continued innovation in developer tools and UI frameworks for AI applications.
insights.author: Hacker News Community
